title: How to study for Big Data?
content: Heard that Big Data's ISAs and ESAs are very tough. How to prepare to be able to answer the questions they might ask?

comments.body: Either you don't, pray for marks... Or else study little everyday regardless of what the prof is doing, and then after college class hours go to the prof and ask doubts.. TA's u can also approach

That's usually not the case.   
The assignments + project is tough, but ISA and ESA is relatively simple if you understand the concept behind all the technologies well.
